kpi.name: M1006C296

kpi_info.title: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DB-HSDPA DUE TO UE NACK
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Radio Bearer setups/reconfigurations for DB-HSDPA because of UE responding with a failure message. Also M1006C212 is updated along with this counter if the radio bearer was not using DC-HSDPA previously. UPDATED: When the UE responds with RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP FAILURE, RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE, RRC: PHYSICAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION FAILURE for DB-HSDPA establishment attempt.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DB-HSDPA DUE TO UE NACK
